string-array.name: stagen6_array
string-array.item: BT Work in progress and completion

string-array.name: qp1_array
string-array.item: Whether EW for formation is in progress
Whether material used for formation is as per specification CC
Whether sub-grade/shoulders compaction is being done layer by layer
Whether shoulders formed upto the top level of next layer

string-array.name: qp2_array
string-array.item: Whether required camber has been achieved
Whether super elevation has been provided in the curv
Whether EW for formation is completed

string-array.name: qp3_array
string-array.item: Verified at Ch……(one point every km
Whether location/span/type of CD and length/type of protective works is as per estimat
Whether any additional CD/protective works are required
Whether necessary quality control tests have been done
Whether quality of materials/work done conform to specification

string-array.name: qp4_array
string-array.item: Whether all CD/protective works have been completed

string-array.name: qp5_array
string-array.item: Whether material collected is as per specification

string-array.name: qp6_array
string-array.item: Whether watering done at OMC, spreading and compaction being done reachwise

string-array.item: Verified at Ch……(one point every km
Whether thickness is as per estimat

Whether Grading of metal is as per specification
Whether Gravel collected is as per specification

string-array.item: Whether thickness is as per estimate

string-array.item: Whether quantity of binder is as per specification
Whether thickness is as per estimat
Whether rolling is sufficient and edge to edg
Whether the surface irregularities is within permissible limit
